title: I feel crushed
body:
Honestly, sometimes playing a game where my team feeds and I get thrashed hard late game doesn't make me angry
I just feel hollow :/

an example, vel koz and orianna are at low health and just finished a team fight I evelyn sneak up (I have 228 AP at the time) and attempt to kill them
Getting spammed by cc ends up killing me (by spamming I mean like 4 spells)

replies.body: i see you problem, your playing evelyn..
Thats one way to put it

I see the problem. You got cced more than a toilet after being used by a 12 year old schoolie who had just been dropped off at home by his step dad who thought it was a good idea to get a super variety bucket each.
